description: Try our easy to follow Quinoa Tabouli Wraps recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Lettuce wrap,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Egg free,Sesame free,Halal,Christmas,Soy free,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Vegan,Tomato,Dairy free,Peanut free
name: Quinoa Tabouli Wraps Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Cook quinoa as per packet instructions. Transfer to a bowl and cool completely.
Combine quinoa, tomato, cucumber, onion, parsley and mint in a bowl.
Whisk lemon juice, oil, garlic and spices together until combined. Season.
Add 2 tbs of dressing to 1 cup of tabouli and toss through. Spoon onto lettuce leaves and roll up, folding in ends. Pack into an airtight container.
